name: Realms of Goldesia - Player-Driven Virtual Reality MMORPG
blurb: An MMORPG that allows for total immersion through its skill-based class system, player-driven world & support for Oculus Rift!

rewards.reward: No Reward
***SAGE***\r\nYour prophecy of Goldesia\u2019s thriving future will be closer to fulfillment. You\u2019ll receive an official thank you and Community Access to our forums.

AVENGER:\r\nRevenge is sweet. Your contribution will help Goldesia stick it to the underlord, and in return, you\u2019ll get an official thank you, Community Access to our forums, and a digital wallpaper of Goldesia.

BARBARIAN:\r\nShare the fruit of your reavings, and you\u2019ll get plenty of plunder. You\u2019ll receive an Official Thank You, Community Access to our forums, a digital wallpaper of Goldesia, and 75 Power Points.
MAGICIAN:\r\nMage donations are what make the magic happen at our studios. In return, you\u2019ll get all the rewards of \u201cAvenger\u201d, plus 100 Power Points and a digital game manual (PDF).

ASSASSIN:\r\nYour donation will be applied to our development with deadly precision. Rewards include all offered in the \u201cMagician\u201d pack, the Realms of Goldesia Game (DRM free), and 125 Power Points.

SORCERER:\r\nSorcerer pledges will go toward the spells and bindings that bring the magical realms to life. This comes with everything from the \u201cAssassin\u201d pack, plus a Development Retrospect PDF, and 50 additional Power Points (175 Total).

SAMURAI:\r\nYour pledge will go toward honoring the old warrior ways, making legendary in-game battle and weapons. Rewards include everything from \u201cSorcerer\u201d, plus digital high-res concept art, and 200 Power Points total. **Lifetime free-to-play access**

KNIGHT:\r\nYour chivalry will be well known among the realms. Get everything from \u201cSamurai\u201d, along with Royal Throne Access, access to pre-sale store items, and 250 Power Points total. **BETA ACCESS**

CONTROLLER: \r\nThe mighty Orbs of the Soul are under your command. You\u2019ll be bestowed with everything from our \u201cKnight\u201d tier, as well as a digital map of the Rivaled Realms and a total of 325 Power Points.

SNIPER:\r\nThanks to your sharpshooting, we\u2019ll be able to make the game weapons even more deadly. Get everything from the \u201cController\u201d tier, plus a ROG poster, The Imperial Access, 375 Power Points (total) and a special starter weapon of your very own.

DECEPTIONIST:\r\nYour cunning ways will influence the twists and turns of our epic plot line. Everything from the \u201cSniper\u201d pack will be yours, in addition to a Digital Strategy Guide and 400 Power Points (total).

GANGSTER:\r\nBecome a famed name among ROG\u2019s gangs of marauders, mercenaries, and rogues by donating. Your payoff will be everything from the \u201cDeceptionist\u201d tier, along with a Digital Concept Art book and 450 Power Points in total.

ILLUSIONIST: \r\nYour donation will make our game success no illusion at all. Get all rewards from the \u201cGangster\u201d pack, plus receive PHYSICAL rewards such as printed game manual, boxed copy of the game, 500 Power Points (total), and a special thank you in the game credits.

MASTERMIND: \r\nThanks to your evil genius, our bad guys will be even bigger and badder. Everything from the \u201cIllustionist\u201d pack will be paid to you in tribute, plus a digital storyboard of the game and 600 Power Points (total).

MANIPULATOR:\r\nYour silver-tongued deceptions deserve to be put to music, so in addition to 625 Power Points (total) and everything from the \u201cMastermind\u201d tier, you\u2019ll get the Digital Game Soundtrack.

SEDUCER:\r\nWith a donation like that, we just can\u2019t resist you. Your charms will be rewarded with all of the \u201cManipulator\u201d rewards, 1000 Power Points (total) plus the rare privilege to name an in-game item and write its description. **ALPHA ACCESS**

***SEDUCER with OCULUS RIFT***\r\nFirst 75 backers will receive free Oculus Rift Virtual Reality Headset. \r\nWith a donation like that, we just can\u2019t resist you. Your charms will be rewarded with all of the \u201cManipulator\u201d rewards, 1000 Power Points (total) plus the rare privilege to name an in-game item and write its description.

CONQUEROR:\r\nClearly, you\u2019re already out to conquer the Rivaled Realms. We\u2019ll help you on your way by giving you everything from the \u201cSeducer\u201d pack, a sneak peek of our Official Game Launch Trailer, and a Printed Strategy Guide.

ROGUE:\r\nFor a rogue, you\u2019re awfully generous. You\u2019ll be thought of as ROG\u2019s own Robin Hood. We\u2019ll reward you with everything from the \u201cConqueror\u201d pack, plus a printed Concept Art book, physical Cloth Map, and digital images/page-images of before and after character design.

CAPTAIN:\r\nAs a captain, you\u2019ll get a chance to steer the direction of ROG\u2019s fauna by designing a creature of your own. In addition to that, you\u2019ll get everything from the \u201cRogue\u201d tier, plus a limited edition signed print.

GENERAL: You\u2019ve risen up in the ranks, and for that, you deserve respect. You\u2019ll be granted your own special in-game title, plus a ROG mouse pad, the CD game soundtrack, and everything from the \u201cCaptain\u201d pack.

COMMANDER:\r\nFulfill your commander duties by collaborating with us on the in-game background music. You\u2019ll also get all of the privileges and rewards of the \u201cGeneral\u201d tier, in addition to a ROG T-Shirt.

CHIEF:\r\nAs some of the most respected figures in the Rivaled Realms, chiefs will get a chance to chat with the owners and creators of ROG, as well as an exclusive signed T-shirt. Everything from the \u201cCommander\u201d pack is also included.

MAJESTY:\r\nYou have a lord\u2019s generosity! Be treated like royalty at our private release party, to which you\u2019ll get an exclusive invitation. You\u2019ll also get everything from the \u201cChief\u201d tier rewards.

DUKE:\r\nYou\u2019re bound to be one of the Goldesian bank\u2019s most cherished allies. Or maybe you are the bank? To thank you for your incredible donation, we\u2019ll grant you everything from the \u201cMajesty\u201d tier, plus a plaque of gratitude, collaboration on both character and level design, and ALL Aarianna publishing digital games until 2020.
